xnn.layers.noise module¶

class xnn.layers.noise.GaussianDropoutLayer(incoming, sigma=1.0, name=None)[source]¶

Bases: lasagne.layers.base.Layer

Drouput with multiplicative Gaussian noise. See http://www.cs.toronto.edu/~rsalakhu/papers/srivastava14a.pdf Does not require rescaling at test time.
